text: {"answer": "I", "reasoning": "Statements i, ii, iii, and v are false: taxes are not deductible as business expenses; free shares are exempt from emission tax; real estate gains are not always taxed both as Grundst√ºckgewinnsteuer and income tax (e.g., private individuals); and legal ownership is not decisive for asset classification in a Kommanditgesellschaft. Statement iv is true. Hence option I lists the false statements."}
